refnamediv.refpurpose: Restores the previously defined exception handler function

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
truerestore_exception_handler
Used after changing the exception handler function using set_exception_handler, to revert to the previous exception handler (which could be the built-in or a user defined function).
As of PHP 8.4, when restore_exception_handler is called from within a user-defined exception handler, it may not immediately restore the previously active handler.
While an exception handler is executing, PHP temporarily replaces the active handler internally to prevent recursive invocation. As a result, restore_exception_handler may need to be called more than once to fully unwind the handler stack.
